##### Looking for things to do in Chicago? Start your journey at the American Writers Museum, one of the most unique museums in Chicago. Located in the heart of downtown Chicago, just steps from Millennium Park and other top attractions, the museum offers an experience unlike any other through interactive exhibits, immersive displays, and one-of-a-kind stories that celebrate the past, present, and future of American writing. Consistently ranked among the best museums in Chicago, the museum is perfect for families, solo explorers, and curious minds alike.

### **When you become an AWM Member, you help support the Museum’s mission to celebrate the writers of past, lift up the writers of today, and inspire the writers of the future. Your support makes all the difference.**

We offer several options for individuals and households to best suit your needs, including new membership levels for teachers, students, and out-of-town folks. Details are included below, along with the many perks that come with being an AWM member.

### **FREE ADMISSION  
**

Members receive free, unlimited admission to the museum every day we are open with absolutely no restrictions. 

### **AUTHOR PROGRAMS & EVENTS  
**

Members receive free admission to author programs and discounts to special events, like [Get Lit](https://americanwritersmuseum.org/get-lit-chicago-happy-hours-at-the-american-writers-museum/?srsltid=AfmBOoqv3hB801Rb1VUCDZvroFRO-noDpzQlknOpqarQb_Lf1OaP1zkn), our monthly happy hour.

### **GIFT SHOP DISCOUNTS  
**

Members receive 15% off in the museum gift shop, both in-person and [online](https://americanwritersmuseum.org/shop/). Plus, members get access to unique member-exclusive merch to show off their AWM pride!

### **FREE ACCESS TO 1500+ MUSEUMS**

Members of our Literary Circle get FREE, reciprocal access to over 1,500 museums across North America with the NARM and ROAM. [**Click here to see a list of museums.**](https://americanwritersmuseum.org/wp-...
